Desc.entry: An organisation contributing to the local community by supporting people, activity and enterprise. Provides creative or work-based activities for people with a learning disability. Spaces available to hire for hosting weekly classes, meetings, conferences or parties as well as office space in new purpose built business units. A community anchor organisation owned and managed by the local community. Industrial and Provident Society no 28699R.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times); Mon-Fri 7.30am-10pm & by arrangement at weekends

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
